name: Bunny RTS lite
description:
Command Your Bunny army, collect Carrots to Gain more Bunnys. Win by Defeating the evil purple Bunnys. This game was made in 3days for the Bitter Jam using a limited tileset. Theres only one Level so its more of a prototype than a full game but enjoy :)

CONTROLS:

Left mouse- click/drag to select units, click building to spawn more bunnys.

Right Mouse- commands selected bunnys to move, combat is automatic.

Arrow Keys- moves the View
